planned.title: Add Review Model
planned.description: Create MongoDB model for product reviews with ratings, user reference, and timestamps

planned.title: Create Reviews API
planned.description: Add API routes for creating, reading, updating, and deleting reviews

planned.title: Add Review Components
planned.description: Create UI components for displaying and submitting reviews

planned.title: Integrate Reviews to Product Page
planned.description: Add reviews section to product detail page with rating display

planned.title: Add Review Translations
planned.description: Add review-related translations to all 5 language files

planned.title: Full Review System Localization
planned.description: Fix wrong namespace casing ('common' â†’ 'Common'), add useTranslations to ReviewForm and StarRating, replace all hardcoded English strings with t() calls across all 4 review components. Added 13 new Common keys to all 5 locale files.

planned.title: Remove Hardcoded Colors from Review Components
planned.description: Replace fill-yellow-400, text-yellow-400, fill-gray-200, text-gray-300, dark:fill-gray-700, dark:text-gray-600 with CSS variables. Added --star-empty-color to globals.css for light and dark modes.

planned.title: Toast Notification System
planned.description: Built custom toast system from scratch. Replaced all native alert()/confirm() dialogs and inline success/error banners across the entire app with animated toasts and a promise-based confirm modal.

notes: Features: 5-star ratings, written reviews, user attribution, average rating calculation
Rate limiting on all review endpoints
One review per user per product (unique constraint)
Reviews tab integrated into product detail page
All 4 review components fully localized (EN, AR, FR, DE, RU)
Star colors driven by --star-color and --star-empty-color CSS variables
Toast system: useToast() for success/error/warning/info, useConfirm() for async confirmation modals
Zero native alert() or window.confirm() calls remain in the codebase
